data.what_is: The only easy to use CRM platform that can handle 100,000s of leads and automate the workflows in your processes. FLG is a complete all-in-one platform that includes a powerful CRM, multi-channel customer contact, intelligent workflows, integration options, marketing automation and reporting & analytics. Unlike our competition, we include 5 star telephone and email support, built-in compliance templates, and we don't make you change your sales process to use it!
data.product_description: The main lead processing engine, capturing every single lead from the point of receipt and managing it through to conversion. Core comes with powerful built-in workflows, routing options, agent management and 2-way communication tools.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FLG?
The simple interface for agents makes this a great solution for companies with lots of staff.

What do you dislike about FLG?
For me its not a 1 stop shop there are a few features which I would like to see implemented which are not on the roadmap at the moment.

What problems is FLG solving and how is that benefiting you?
A simple way for staff to manage there customers and pipelines.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FLG?
FLG is very easy to work with straight from the moment I log in. Greatly supported through the wonderful telephone support team improving every week. And the support team is naturally available to help you 24 hours with any issue.

What do you dislike about FLG?
I really don't find any missing part of this product. Everything works properly. So there is nothing to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering FLG:
I highly recommend it.

What problems is FLG solving and how is that benefiting you?
I started using FLG in the last 8 months. I found it was a very open platform for managing leads. Since then I am solving all my leads management problems through this platform. It helps me to increase my business performance.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about FLG?
The UI is simpler. The integration with other third-party software like excel and Facebook is quite easy and simple. The Multi-channel customer contact is awesome.

What do you dislike about FLG?
The pricing part is a little heavy for their heavy usage otherwise it is very good for small usage.

What problems is FLG solving and how is that benefiting you?
250,000 emails monthly, SMS short links, Audit reports are some of their best features. The Automation part is very amazing and it saves my time so much.
